exclusion.criterion: Previous hip/pelvis, knee, ankle, or foot surgery within the past year
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Injury to the lower extremities six months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known balance impairment due to neurological disorder, vestibular disorder, medication use, or other
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concussion within the previous three months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Wilson disease, which may affect balance and coordination. However, no recent concussion or surgery reported.
